statements: SELECT * FROM sales_data;
SELECT order_id, product_name, sale_amount FROM sales_data;
SELECT customer_id, product_name, sale_amount FROM sales_data WHERE sale_amount > 100;
SELECT customer_id, product_name, sale_amount FROM sales_data ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT MAX(sale_amount) AS highest_sale_amount, MIN(sale_amount) AS lowest_sale_amount FROM sales_data;
SELECT order_id, product_name, sale_amount, customer_id, order_date FROM sales_data WHERE sale_amount > 1000 ORDER BY order_date DESC
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE customer_id = 12345 AND sale_amount >= 500 ORDER BY product_name ASC
SELECT product_name, SUM(sale_amount) AS total_sales FROM sales_data GROUP BY product_name HAVING total_sales > 5000 ORDER BY total_sales DESC
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_orders FROM sales_data WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY total_orders DESC
SELECT DISTINCT customer_id, AVG(sale_amount) AS avg_sale_amount FROM sales_data WHERE sale_amount < 500 GROUP BY customer_id HAVING avg_sale_amount > 200 ORDER BY avg_sale_amount DESC
SELECT sale_date, sales_amount FROM sales_data WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE sale_id = 456;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE product_id = 789;
SELECT sale_date, sales_amount, customer_id FROM sales_data WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT product_id, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM sales_data JOIN products ON sales_data.product_id = products.product_id WHERE sales_data.sales_amount > 1000 ORDER BY sale_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT product_name, price, COUNT(*) AS total_sales FROM sales_data JOIN products ON sales_data.product_id = products.product_id GROUP BY product_name ORDER BY total_sales DESC
SELECT customer_id, SUM(sales_amount) AS total_sales FROM sales_data GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_sales > 5000 ORDER BY total_sales DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT product_name, AVG(price) AS avg_price, MAX(price) AS max_price, MIN(price) AS min_price FROM products GROUP BY product_name

SELECT sale_date, product_name, sales_amount FROM sales_data JOIN products ON sales_data.product_id = products.product_id WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY sales_amount DESC LIMIT 20
SELECT * FROM SalesData WHERE transaction_amount > 100
SELECT transaction_id, product_id, transaction_date FROM SalesData WHERE customer_id = 101
SELECT customer_id, transaction_amount FROM SalesData WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31'
SELECT product_id, customer_id FROM SalesData ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC
SELECT * FROM SalesData ORDER BY transaction_date ASC
SELECT * FROM SalesData WHERE transaction_amount > 100 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount FROM SalesData WHERE product_id = 5 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC
SELECT customer_id, SUM(transaction_amount) as total_amount FROM SalesData GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_amount > 500
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(transaction_id) as num_transactions FROM SalesData GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY num_transactions DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT AVG(transaction_amount) as average_amount, MAX(transaction_amount) as max_amount, MIN(transaction_amount) as min_amount FROM SalesData
SELECT * FROM Products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products WHERE price > 1000;
SELECT customer_name, city, state FROM Customers WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM Sales WHERE quantity >= 10 ORDER BY total_price DESC;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM Products ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT * FROM Products;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT customer_name, city, state FROM Customers WHERE state = 'California';
SELECT o.order_id, c.customer_name, s.sale_date FROM Orders o JOIN Customers c ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id JOIN Sales s ON o.sale_id = s.sale_id;
SELECT p.product_name, s.quantity, s.total_price FROM Sales s JOIN Products p ON s.product_id = p.product_id;
SELECT * FROM sales_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, total_amount FROM sales_transactions WHERE total_amount > 100;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products ORDER BY unit_price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT order_id, total_amount, status FROM orders WHERE status = 'pending';
SELECT * FROM sales_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, product_id, total_amount FROM sales_transactions WHERE quantity > 5 ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT customers.customer_name, orders.total_amount, orders.status FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id WHERE orders.status = 'Shipped';
SELECT product_name, category, unit_price FROM products WHERE unit_price BETWEEN 10 AND 50 ORDER BY product_name ASC;

SELECT sales_transactions.transaction_date, products.product_name, product_sales.quantity FROM sales_transactions JOIN products ON sales_transactions.product_id = products.product_id JOIN product_sales ON sales_transactions.transaction_id = product_sales.transaction_id WHERE sales_transactions.total_amount > 100 ORDER BY product_sales.quantity DESC;
